name: Goodstack Nonprofit Discounts
description: Offers discounted access to essential software and tech tools like Zoom, Adobe Acrobat, Asana, and OpenAI plans for eligible nonprofit organizations
fullDescription: Goodstack (formerly Percent) is a platform that helps nonprofits access discounted software and technology tools from major companies like Zoom, Adobe, Asana, and OpenAI.
whatTheyOffer:
- Discounted access to Zoom, Adobe Acrobat, Asana, and more
- OpenAI/ChatGPT plans for nonprofits
- Various SaaS and cloud service discounts
- Centralized platform to manage all nonprofit discounts
howToGetIt:
1. Visit causes.goodstack.io
2. Verify your nonprofit status (501c3 or equivalent)
3. Create an organizational account
4. Browse available discounts and offers
5. Claim discounts directly through the platform
